intents.name: Data Extraction
intents.description: Extracts relevant information from KYC documents such as names, addresses, and identification numbers.
examples: Extract the name and address from this ID.
What is the identification number on this document?
Get the date of birth from this passport.
Generate a summary for this KYC document
Generate a summary for this document

name: KYC Document Processing
scope: Handles all tasks related to summarizing and processing documents, including document verification, data extraction, and compliance checks.
